Headline: #9 Ashland & #X9 Ashland Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near Ashland/Jackson
ShortDescription: Revised: SB 9 Ashland & X9 Ashland Express buses temp rerouted via Ashland, Jackson, Loomis, Van Buren & Ashland: due to street blockage near Ashland/Jackson.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Revised: Southbound #9 Ashland & #X9 Ashland Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Jackson, Loomis, Van Buren, then resume their normal route on Ashland, due to street blockage near Ashland/Jackson.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #55 Garfield Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Garfield/Michigan
ShortDescription: EB 55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via Garfield, Michigan, 57th, Perry, & Garfield, due to street blockage near Garfield/Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via Garfield, Michigan, 57th, Perry, then resume their normal route on Garfield, due to street blockage near Garfield/Michigan.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
